title: Why cannot my phone be paired with other Bluetooth devices?
answer:
l   The phone cannot find other Bluetooth devices. 


 Verify that Bluetooth is enabled on other devices and these devices are discoverable. 

 l   The phone cannot detect the Bluetooth headset. 

 Verify that the headset is discoverable. For related settings about the headset, see the user guide of the headset. 

 l   The phone cannot establish connections with other phones when sending files. 

 Verify that the paired phone is able to receive files or supports the format of the file being sent.
